original_text: Jesus then said, ‘When a bad spirit leaves a person, it travels through dry places. It looks for a new place to live. But maybe it does not find anywhere.
korean_text: 더러운 귀신이 사람에게서 나갔을 때에 물 없는 곳으로 다니며 쉬기를 구하되 쉴 곳을 얻지 못하고

sentences.original_text: When a bad spirit leaves a person
It looks for a new place to live
But maybe it does not find anywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어쩌면 그것은 어디에도 찾지 못할 것이다
